description: print in shades of blue with red lightning bolts; man with ornately decorated, windblown robes and wild, windblown hair with hands bound and clasped at chest looking to PR; branch with blossoms in mouth; lightning striking around him
text: An aizuri-e (with red lightning) fan print showing the actor Bando Mitsugorō IV as Kan Shōjō in the play Sugawara denju tenarai kagami (Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy) performed at the Nakamura Theatre, 5/1832. This is the Mt. Tenpai scene where Kan Shōjō, in a rage, transforms himself into a demon surrounded by a thunderbolt. A famous scene, indeed the play was repeated at another theatre just four months later.
title: The Actor Bando Mitsugorō IV as Kan Shōjō
